categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: The Weapon of a Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: The Weapon of a Jedi 2

Star Wars Adventures: The Weapon of a Jedi 2 is the second issue of the Star Wars Adventures: The Weapon of a Jedi comic series, a reprint of the previously released miniseries Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi. The comic was written by Jason Fry and Alec Worley, illustrated by Ruairí Coleman, and released by IDW Publishing on June 30, 2021.

The Rebel Alliance has destroyed the Empire's dreaded Death Star, but the Imperial starfleet continues hunting the rebels throughout the galaxy. Luke Skywalker now seeks to support the Rebellion as an X-wing fighter. But as he flies with the pilots of the Red Squadron, Luke feels stirrings of the Force. And this farm boy turned fighter pilot begins to suspect that his destiny lies along a different path.
